import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Container, Navbar, Nav, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { logout } from '../actions/userActions' imp // import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } return (
Thuận's Shoe
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : Sign In } {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && ( Users Products Orders )}
) } export default Header
